title: Coinews
author: Coinews
content: TOKEN NAME: Buddy CoinBuddy Coin represents a community-based protocol that grants 3% reflection to $BDC token-holders. Also, the team aims to release a marketplace for NFT and other valuable products.Buddy Coin's AdvantagesThere are two advantages to Buddy Coin's startup. First, the developers plan to launch a great pack of products. It will contain a marketplace for non-fungible tokens, DEX, Lottery, Crypto gaming, and Launchpad. The second benefit gives a four percent commission from each transaction to everyone who holds $BDC.What's the Buddy token?BUDDY is a BEP20 (BSC) community-driven token with a 10% tax rate. So, the contract takes a ten percent fee from each transaction. Then, 3% goes to all existing token-holders. Also, 5% goes to the LP-generating mechanism. Another 1% goes to the charity address. And the rest 1% goes to the burning wallet.Token: Buddy CoinSymbol: BDCToken total supply: 1,000,000,000,000,000BSC Smart contract address: 0x7d6a72a3039a6da421e9a2340ae94e8efae70aa2White Paper:  https://buddycoin.eu/whitepaper.pdfDisclaimerAlso, be aware that the text on this page is not investment advice. Moreover, Tokpie does not give any legal, tax, financial suggestions, or warranty of the token's price performance.Additional links to trade BUDDY tokensMarket to trade the BUDDY tokens on DEX: BDC/BNBFor any questions or cooperation, contact Buddy Coin at https://t.me/BuddyCoinEUThanks
